welcome_message:
Welcome to the default SQL template for Databricks Asset Bundles!

Please answer the below to tailor your project to your preferences.
You can always change your mind and change your configuration in the databricks.yml file later.

Note that {{workspace_host}} is used for initialization
(see https://docs.databricks.com/dev-tools/cli/profiles.html for how to change your profile).

project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, and underscores.

project_name_short.//: This is a derived property based on project_name (it replaces sql_project with sample and strips _project|_app|_service)

include_job.//: This property is always set to 'yes' for default-sql (job runs the pipeline)

include_pipeline.//: This property is always set to 'yes' for default-sql (pipeline processes SQL files)

include_python.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-sql

http_path.pattern_match_failure_message: Path must be of the form /sql/1.0/warehouses/<warehouse id>
http_path.description:
Please provide the HTTP Path of the SQL warehouse you would like to use during development.
You can find this path by clicking on "Connection details" for your SQL warehouse.
http_path [example: /sql/1.0/warehouses/abcdef1234567890]

default_catalog.description: Default catalog for any tables created by this project{{if eq (default_catalog) ""}} (leave blank when not using Unity Catalog){{end}}

personal_schemas.description:
Use a personal schema for each user working on this project
(this is recommended, your personal schema will be '{{.default_catalog}}.{{short_name}}')
enum: no (advanced: I will customize the schema configuration later in databricks.yml)

language.//: This property is always set to 'sql'

lakeflow_only.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-sql
